member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.ToDouble
member.summary: The function returns the current Fraction object as double

member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.ToString
member.summary: The function returns the current Fraction object as a string

member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.ToFraction(System.String)
member.summary: The function takes an string as an argument and returns its corresponding reduced fraction the string can be an in the form of and integer, double or fraction. e.g it can be like "123" or "123.321" or "123/456"

member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.ToFraction(System.Double)
member.summary: The function takes a floating point number as an argument and returns its corresponding reduced fraction

member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.Duplicate
member.summary: The function replicates current Fraction object

member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.Inverse(Mehroz.Fraction)
member.summary: The function returns the inverse of a Fraction object

member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.op_Implicit(System.Int64)~Mehroz.Fraction
member.summary: overloaed user defined conversions: from numeric data types to Fractions

member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.op_Explicit(Mehroz.Fraction)~System.Double
member.summary: overloaed user defined conversions: from fractions to double and string

member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: checks whether two fractions are equal

member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.GetHashCode
member.summary: returns a hash code for this fraction

member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.GCD(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: The function returns GCD of two numbers (used for reducing a Fraction)

member.name: M:Mehroz.Fraction.ReduceFraction(Mehroz.Fraction)
member.summary: The function reduces(simplifies) a Fraction object by dividing both its numerator and denominator by their GCD

member.name: T:Mehroz.FractionException
member.summary: Exception class for Fraction, derived from System.Exception
